title: Identify the Oxidizing Agent
text: In a redox reaction, the oxidizing agent is the substance that gets reduced. Look for the element that gains electrons.

title: Determine the Oxidation States
text: Assign oxidation states to each element in the reactants and products. This will help you identify which element is oxidized and which is reduced.

title: Focus on Silver and Iron
text: Consider the changes in oxidation states for silver (Ag) and iron (Fe) in the reaction. Which one gains electrons?

title: Identify the Reduced Substance
text: Which substance gains electrons in the reaction?
